MaxWalkSpeed.Description: Base max walk speed of the QatarKiller

TerrorRadius.Description: Base terror radius, in centimeters, of the QatarKiller

NumberOfPortals.Description: How many portals do we start with

PortalToPortalDistanceRestriction.Description: How far away (in centimeters) do we have to be to from a portal to set another portal

PortalToMeatHookDistanceRestriction.Description: Meat hook to portal distance restriction.

PortalToPalletDistanceRestriction.Description: (Un destroyed) pallet to portal distance restriction.

PortalToExitSwitchDistanceRestriction.Description: Exit Switch to portal distance restriction

PortalRestrictToWorldAreasEnabled.Description: Whether we should restrict portal to locations flagged as WORLD or not. Helps to prevent portals in unreachable areas.

SetPortalCooldown.Description: Cooldown on power after setting a portal

SetPortal_SecondsToCharge.Description: How long it takes to set a portal

Teleport_SecondsToCharge.Description: How long it takes to activate a portal

TeleportToPortalCooldown.Description: Cooldown on power after using a portal

Teleport_MinDuration.Description: Minimum length of time in seconds for the teleport action. Only counts time while travelling, not the beginning of the action or exit animations.

Teleport_MaxDuration.Description: Maximum length of time in seconds for the teleport action. Only counts time while travelling, not the beginning of the action or exit animations.

Teleport_SuggestedVelocity.Description: Approximate velocity during the teleport. Actual velocity can also be affected by Teleport_MinDuration and Teleport_MaxDuration

PortalRadius.Description: The radius of the prototype portal, in centimeters

AllowPartialDashCharge.Description: 1 for yes, 0 for no. Can we trigger a dash early for a % of the duration?

PrototypeDash_SecondsToCharge.Description: Time required to charge the dash to full duration

SlasherAttackQatarDashOpenTime.Description: Maximum duration of the open phase of the pounce

SlasherAttackQatarDashEmulateGamepadForM.Description: Should we use gamepad emulation to limit turn speed? 1 for yes, 0 for no. Works like billy chainsaw.

SlasherAttackQatarDashYawScale.Description: How much is the player allowed to turn? Works like billy chainsaw

SlasherAttackQatarDashYawAdjustmentTime.Description: How long does it take to reach the desired yaw scale? Works like billy chainsaw

SlasherAttackQatarDashChargeThreshold.Description: Percentage of the charge time that must have passed for an actual charged pounce to occur. Underneath this threshold will release a normal attack.

SlasherAttackQatarDashAudioChargeThresho.Description: How far into the charge of the pounce should we trigger the associated sound.

SlasherAttackQatarDashModifyFov.Description: Units: Degrees. Change in FoV During the special pounce.

SlasherAttackQatarDashCancelCooldownTime.Description: When cancelling the pounce at full charge, how long before we allow to attack or interact again. Partial charges will only restrict the duration by an appropriate percentage of this value.

PortalAreaEffectRadius.Description: The area to inflict survivors with the revealed effect.

TeleportStealthDuration.Description: Duration of the stealth effect after the teleportation
